{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3057269,"name":"Caleb Widener","username":"ccdub","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/ccdub/{size}/190644_2.png","created_at":"2022-05-04T01:58:44.028Z","cooked":"

Why did the Dynamo motor ‚Äúflop,‚Äù and team with experience using them, what was your experience like?

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-05-04T01:58:44.028Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":338,"reads":679,"readers_count":678,"score":1825.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":410927,"topic_slug":"why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular","display_username":"Caleb Widener","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":40414,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Honorary member of 7157"},"post_url":"/t/why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular/410927/1","custom_user_title":"Honorary member of 7157","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3057270,"name":"Eugene Fang","username":"Eugene_Fang","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/eugene_fang/{size}/65109_2.png","created_at":"2022-05-04T02:00:19.355Z","cooked":"

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-05-04T02:00:19.355Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":678,"readers_count":677,"score":535.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":410927,"topic_slug":"why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular","display_username":"Eugene Fang","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":"The-Blue-Alliance","flair_url":"/uploads/default/original/3X/0/2/02b18ea7720fea44e77469bb5261acf1c7045a6e.png","flair_bg_color":"","flair_color":"","flair_group_id":67,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":28}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":7439,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"604 Alum & Mentor | The Blue Alliance"},"post_url":"/t/why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular/410927/2","custom_user_title":"604 Alum & Mentor | The Blue Alliance","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":26},{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":28,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3057271,"name":"Sean Lavery","username":"Lil_Lavery","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/lil_lavery/{size}/65226_2.png","created_at":"2022-05-04T02:02:07.849Z","cooked":"

It‚Äôs largely underspecced for most FRC applications (aside of doing things like actuating latches/trigger mechanisms or maybe rotating a turret). But it did open the door to other BLDC motors in FRC, so that‚Äôs appreciated. I am surprised Nidec never came back with anything else in their gigantic collection of BLDC options that was more appropriate for FRC.

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-05-04T02:02:38.822Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":5,"reads":671,"readers_count":670,"score":239.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":410927,"topic_slug":"why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular","display_username":"Sean Lavery","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":3}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":2514,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"FRC 1712"},"post_url":"/t/why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular/410927/3","custom_user_title":"FRC 1712","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":3}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":3,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3057285,"name":"Richard Wallace","username":"Richard_Wallace","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/richard_wallace/{size}/110760_2.png","created_at":"2022-05-04T02:52:17.951Z","cooked":"

To offer an FRC specific product would require some engineering work ‚Äî see CTRE, AndyMark, VexPro, REV Robotics, etc. Nidec engaged FIRST HQ with sales people, not engineers. Sales people start every new opportunity by offering existing products.

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-05-04T02:52:17.951Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":3,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":4,"reads":623,"readers_count":622,"score":244.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":410927,"topic_slug":"why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular","display_username":"Richard Wallace","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":2514,"username":"Lil_Lavery","name":"Sean Lavery","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/lil_lavery/{size}/65226_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":6}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":1549,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"I live for the details."},"post_url":"/t/why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular/410927/4","custom_user_title":"I live for the details.","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":6}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":6,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3057288,"name":"ricky","username":"rZhov","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/rzhov/{size}/186133_2.png","created_at":"2022-05-04T03:07:42.959Z","cooked":"

I‚Äôm not familiar with the FRC history regarding Nidec, but their engineering offerings have been extremely stiff in my automotive experience. Would be interesting if they even came close to a FRC-centric solution.

","post_number":5,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-05-04T03:07:42.959Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":566,"readers_count":565,"score":123.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":410927,"topic_slug":"why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular","display_username":"ricky","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":30817,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"dm me bad ideas"},"post_url":"/t/why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular/410927/5","custom_user_title":"dm me bad ideas","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3057289,"name":"EricH","username":"EricH","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/erich/{size}/128938_2.png","created_at":"2022-05-04T03:08:25.096Z","cooked":"

I think his point was:

Nidec (presumably) HAS better motors for FRC in their BLDC line already. How come those motors aren‚Äôt available to FRC?

Not asking them to engineer a new motor just for FRC‚Ä¶

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-05-04T03:08:25.096Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":4,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":545,"readers_count":544,"score":134.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":410927,"topic_slug":"why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular","display_username":"EricH","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":1549,"username":"Richard_Wallace","name":"Richard Wallace","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/richard_wallace/{size}/110760_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":4212,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"#westandwithUkraine"},"post_url":"/t/why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular/410927/6","custom_user_title":"#westandwithUkraine","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3057310,"name":"Sean Lavery","username":"Lil_Lavery","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/lil_lavery/{size}/65226_2.png","created_at":"2022-05-04T03:59:59.664Z","cooked":"

Nidec has literally hundreds of different motor options already in production. I would be shocked if at least a couple of them weren‚Äôt better suited for FRC than the DM3012-1063. Even if it‚Äôs de-rating a 24VDC nominal BLDC.

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-05-04T03:59:59.664Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":4,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":489,"readers_count":488,"score":102.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":410927,"topic_slug":"why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular","display_username":"Sean Lavery","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":1549,"username":"Richard_Wallace","name":"Richard Wallace","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/richard_wallace/{size}/110760_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":2514,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"FRC 1712"},"post_url":"/t/why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular/410927/7","custom_user_title":"FRC 1712","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3057313,"name":"Eli Barnett","username":"Oblarg","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/oblarg/{size}/161674_2.png","created_at":"2022-05-04T04:11:32.449Z","cooked":"

I think the real reason it flopped was the use of comic sans (and the eye-searing orange-and-blue color scheme) in the product manual.

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-05-04T04:11:32.449Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":457,"readers_count":456,"score":271.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":410927,"topic_slug":"why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular","display_username":"Eli Barnett","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":11}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":12381,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Robot apartments! invisible suburbs! skeleton treasuries!"},"post_url":"/t/why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular/410927/8","custom_user_title":"Robot apartments! invisible suburbs! skeleton treasuries!","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":11},{"id":"laughing","type":"emoji","count":3}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":14,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3057316,"name":"Ethan Braun","username":"satel","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/satel/{size}/162292_2.png","created_at":"2022-05-04T04:25:54.089Z","cooked":"
Oblarg:

eye-searing orange-and-blue color scheme

*Sad 3216 noises

","post_number":9,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-05-04T04:25:54.089Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":8,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":442,"readers_count":441,"score":163.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":410927,"topic_slug":"why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular","display_username":"Ethan Braun","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":4}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":49513,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Moving on"},"post_url":"/t/why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular/410927/9","custom_user_title":"Moving on","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":4},{"id":"laughing","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":6,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3057317,"name":"Nick Aarestad","username":"cadandcookies","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/cadandcookies/{size}/158154_2.png","created_at":"2022-05-04T04:26:25.531Z","cooked":"

Besides the poor product-market fit, I think that the borderline contempt for the community exhibited in their advertising was a minor factor.

","post_number":10,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-05-04T04:26:25.531Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":432,"readers_count":431,"score":141.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":410927,"topic_slug":"why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular","display_username":"Nick Aarestad","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":4}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":17187,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular/410927/10","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":3},{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":4,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3057319,"name":"bobbysq","username":"bobbysq","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/bobbysq/{size}/195893_2.png","created_at":"2022-05-04T04:32:23.064Z","cooked":"

This infomercial-sounding guy didn‚Äôt sell you on it?

","post_number":11,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-05-04T04:32:23.064Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":10,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":422,"readers_count":421,"score":209.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":410927,"topic_slug":"why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular","display_username":"bobbysq","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZWk1z_IKdqQ","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Nidec and FIRST Robotics - YouTube","clicks":6}],"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":17187,"username":"cadandcookies","name":"Nick Aarestad","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/cadandcookies/{size}/158154_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":7}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":28014,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"he/him"},"post_url":"/t/why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular/410927/11","custom_user_title":"he/him","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":7},{"id":"laughing","type":"emoji","count":3}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":10,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3057326,"name":"Anand Rajamani","username":"asid61","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/asid61/{size}/7179_2.png","created_at":"2022-05-04T05:03:19.375Z","cooked":"

My favorite part of this ad (although it‚Äôs hard to choose, honestly) is that there isn‚Äôt any footage of the Nidec Dynamo running during the video. And when they later released footage it was clear why - it took more than a full match length to complete a simple 2017 rope climb.

Proper gearing probably could have sold it a little better‚Ä¶

","post_number":12,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-05-04T05:03:19.375Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":11,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":397,"readers_count":396,"score":159.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":410927,"topic_slug":"why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular","display_username":"Anand Rajamani","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":28014,"username":"bobbysq","name":"bobbysq","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/bobbysq/{size}/195893_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":5}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":21715,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular/410927/12","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":5}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":5,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3057329,"name":"Mike Schreiber","username":"Mike_Schreiber","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/mike_schreiber/{size}/200098_2.png","created_at":"2022-05-04T05:10:59.035Z","cooked":"

It probably didn‚Äôt go over well because it didn‚Äôt offer field oriented control.

So the other fun thing that kinda happened in parallel: CIM motor limits disappearing.

Historically, the number of ‚Äúgood‚Äù motors was artificially limited by the rules, so most robot mechanisms were powered by motors that were less than ideal for the application. Nidec released that product into a huge market void that was just being created for high-power motors, which exacerbated the effect of it being under-powered.

If my choice is ‚ÄúWindow motor or nidec‚Äù, I‚Äôm picking nidec every time. The key is that, at the time Nidec was released, I never actually had to make that choice.

","post_number":16,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-05-04T12:08:38.625Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":329,"readers_count":328,"score":230.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":410927,"topic_slug":"why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular","display_username":"Chris Gerth","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":8}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":24617,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/why-is-the-dynamo-brushless-motor-so-un-popular/410927/16","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":8}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":8,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3057367,"name":"Richard Wallace","username":"Richard_Wallace","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/richard_wallace/{size}/110760_2.png","created_at":"2022-05-04T12:15:15.035Z","cooked":"

Makes you appreciate the challenge of swerve drive in those days. I recall needing to see the Bomb Squad‚Äôs ‚Äújunkyard letter‚Äù to verify that their azimuth motors were all legal in 2012. IIRC that year only allowed two KoP window motors, so the other two had to be from a verified automotive source.

Now we have a horsepower arms race, limited only by the number of 12V circuits. It is no wonder that the robots are pwning the carpet.

Richard_Wallace:

Now we have a horsepower arms race, limited only by the number of 12V circuits. It is no wonder that the robots are pwning the carpet.

at ~2 HP (1500W, or ~200A * 7V, plus or minus) battery internal resistance causes the voltage to drop and the robot to ‚Äúbrown-out‚Äù. That will put an upper limit on robot power no matter how many motors teams throw at the carpet (as long as we have these batteries anyway).

I don‚Äôt know‚Ä¶ it was pretty popular to us:

Nidec - All for Dreams General Forum
Here at the FIRST Houston Championship, we have enjoyed the best thing in robotics since wheels, the Nidec brushless motor. We have embarked on many adventures with this motor, and have taken on their motto, All for Dreams. [image] [image] [image] [image] [image]
Nidec- All for Memes General Forum
We are back with the latest progress in the forefront in FRC brushless motor technology. After weeks of hard work and fumes, deusXmachinist, a 900 alum, has completed this wonderful masterpiece to pay tribute to this step forward in FRC history. [image]

I still wear my Nidec shirt all the time too. Love that thing.
